title: Anantika Polki Jhumka - Timeless Elegance
materials: 22K Gold Plated base. Features premium Polki diamonds (uncut diamonds) with a white polish finish. The center stones are natural Sapphires and the pearl drops are genuine cultured pearls. Hyderabadi craftsmanship ensures exceptional detailing and durability.
features: Inspired by traditional South Indian temple jewelry, these Jhumkas feature intricate Polki diamond settings arranged in a floral halo around an oval-shaped Aqua center stone. A sapphire teardrop adds a regal touch, while the delicate pearl drops provide a classic finishing touch. The design is reminiscent of traditional Nakshi work (నక్షి పని), adding a timeless appeal.
colors: The color palette consists of a warm white finish from the Polki diamonds
a soft blue Aquamarine hue in the center stone
all complementing the golden sheen of the base.
occasions: and traditional South Indian ceremonies like Seemantham (సీమంతం) or half-saree functions (Langa Voni/లంగా వోణి). Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary evening wear.
description: These Anantika Polki Jhumkas blend traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern sensibilities. The use of uncut Polki diamonds adds a touch of royalty, while the sapphire and pearl accents create a refined look. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, these earrings are not just jewelry; they are a piece of art and a symbol of cultural heritage. Their durability ensures they will be cherished for generations.
